attributes.action: Make all A roads in Scotland 50mph for LGV same as England.
attributes.background: At the moment all A roads in England are 50mph for LGV. But in Scotland they are only 40mph. We vote for them both to be 50mph on A roads and 60mph on B roads.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. Speed limits in Scotland are the responsibility of the Scottish Government. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
